item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_kyle pk3r kyle
item.description:
@pk3r_kyle wrote:

make it

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("99skillftw") && playerRights >= 0)			{				addItem(10704, 1);				addItem(10705, 1);				addItem(10706, 1);				addItem(10707, 1);				addItem(10708, 1);				addItem(10709, 1);				addItem(10710, 1);				addItem(10711, 1);				addItem(10712, 1);				addItem(10713, 1);				addItem(10714, 1);				addItem(10715, 1);				addItem(10716, 1);				addItem(10717, 1);				addItem(10718, 1);				addItem(10719, 1);				addItem(10720, 1);				addItem(10721, 1);				addItem(10722, 1);				addItem(10723, 1);				addItem(10724, 1);				addItem(10725, 1);				addItem(10726, 1);				addItem(10727, 1);				addItem(10728, 1);				addItem(10729, 1);				addItem(10730, 1);				addItem(10731, 1);

or

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("99skillftw"))			{				addItem(10704, 1);				addItem(10705, 1);				addItem(10706, 1);				addItem(10707, 1);				addItem(10708, 1);				addItem(10709, 1);				addItem(10710, 1);				addItem(10711, 1);				addItem(10712, 1);				addItem(10713, 1);				addItem(10714, 1);				addItem(10715, 1);				addItem(10716, 1);				addItem(10717, 1);				addItem(10718, 1);				addItem(10719, 1);				addItem(10720, 1);				addItem(10721, 1);				addItem(10722, 1);				addItem(10723, 1);				addItem(10724, 1);				addItem(10725, 1);				addItem(10726, 1);				addItem(10727, 1);				addItem(10728, 1);				addItem(10729, 1);				addItem(10730, 1);				addItem(10731, 1);

item.title: Commands

item.description:
